title: Inputs double, outputs triple, economies of scale

content.question: Under which of the following circumstances is a firm experiencing economics of scale?

choices.label: The firm increases only its labor input, and output decreases.
The firm doubles its inputs, and output triples.
The firm builds a new plant, and the average cost of production increases.
The firm hires a new plant manager, and profits increase.
The product price increases, and the firm increases its output.

content.answer: The firm doubles its inputs, and output triples.
